name: Silver Fox Pendant
description:
Sonya Bennett is among Britain's leading designers of contemporary precious jewellery. All of her beautiful work is exclusively designed and made in her Somerset workshop, and is inspired by the key themes of  nature, love and art. 

Materials - sterling silver
Dimensions - chain 18", fox head 1cm long

name: Stargazer Lilly & Hibiscus Jam Jar Scented Candle
description:
Part of the Country Kitchen Scented Candle Range. The scents available are all associated with a Country Kitchen, and to retain the homely feel, they come in jam jars. Made of natural plant waxes, and produced in the UK, they have a typical burn time of 50-60 hrs. 

Size: 
Measuring 9.5cm height x 8cm diameter

name: Soap
description:
'You Can't Buy Happiness But You Can Buy Cake And Thats Kind of The Same Thing' Block Soap, 2 Pieces Set.

These Organic Soaps are an ideal gift for Friends and Family. Pack contains 2 x 100gm soaps and are a nice subtle soap for delicate skin. These soaps play on the Cake phrase, as they carry an "Apple & Almond" scent. So although not a Cake, a beautiful scent that doesn't contain any calories!

name: Lip Balm
description:
Lip Balms by Green and Co.
Make sure you have the softest lips for kissing under the mistletoe this year!  Great to throw in your bag for emergency kissable lips or to give as a little gift for someone special. They appeal to girls of all ages, from little ones who adore the yummy scents to the more supposedly grown up among us who still like the little essentials in life. They are organic, made from Melissa Oil and Natural Oil. A must for looking after those lovely lips!

name: Bunny Rabbit Knitted Pincushion
description:
A cute and cheeky knitted bunny rabbit pincushion, knitted in bright Scottish lambswool with a plump fluffy mohair tail and sparkly sequin eye.
The reverse is finished in a variety of brightly coloured patchwork patterned fabric.
100% Scottish lambswool, mohair tail, 100% cotton backing, polyester stuffing.  15 x 8cms.

name: Vintage Tattoo Style Knitted Tea Cosy
description:
This vintage tattoo style tea cosy features an applique heart motif, a witty present for all your tea loving friends and their hard working tea pots!  The interior of the tea cosy is made from brightly coloured, patterned fabric and a layer of wadding to really keep the heat in.
33 x 28cms, 100% British Lambswool, 100% cotton lining, synthetic wadding.
Emotive Textiles for Design conscious people by Nervous Stitch.

name: Christmas Candle Workshop
description:
Sunday 8th December, 12.30 -2pm.  Join us to learn how to make a beautiful centre piece for your Christmas Table using fresh moss, pine cones, dried pink peppercorns and Christmas decorations to take home and keep!
45 x 20cms.
Materials, Mulled Wine & Mince Pies supplied!
You will also receive a 10% Discount on goods purchased on the day!

name: Christmas Door Wreath Workshop
description:
Sunday 15th December, 12.30 -2pm.  
Join us to learn how to make a beautiful Door Wreath for your front door using a 12 inch fresh pine wreath, pine cones, dried pink peppercorns and Christmas decorations finished off with a beautiful big ribbon, to take home and keep!

Materials, Mulled Wine & Mince Pies supplied!
You will also receive a 10% Discount on goods purchased on the day! 
*Please note these can also be used as a centre piece for your Christmas table if placed on a large charger plate and a chunky church candle popped in the centre.  (We have everything you need!)

name: Fresh Wreath Table Decoration with Candle
description:
Made to order Fresh Door Wreaths.
A fresh 10 inch Pine Wreath with Pine cones, pink peppercorns and Christmas decorations, topped off with a chunky church candle on a charger for the centre of your Christmas Table!

* Click and Collect at Claremont Gallery during our Festive Opening Times at a time to suit you! Just let us know at the checkout!
Wed -Sat 10am -5pm
Thursday 12th Dec 10am -8pm
Sunday's 12.30 -4pm
Closed from 23rd December & re-open Wednesday 7th January 2014!
